content: ch2 2dc round 3 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join again you are only making half a corner isn t this joining technique awesome *1dc into the 1st hidden st this may be a little hard to get into but please don t skip this st skip the next st 1fpdc around the fpdc from round 2 now working behind the fpdc you just made - 1dc into the skip st 1dc into the next st skip the next st this is the fpdc from round 2 1dc into the next st 1fpdc around the fpdc you just skipped 1dc in the last st 2dc ch2 2dc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2dc ch2 2dc 2dc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch3 to complete the last corner per side 2fpdc 5dc per corner 2dc ch2 2dc 3 round 4 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *1dc into the 1st hidden st skip the next 2sts 1fpdc around the fpdc from round 3 now working behind the fpdc you just made - 1dc into each of the 2 skip sts starting with a double_crochet in the 1st skip st 1dc into each of the next 3 sts skip the next st this is the fpdc from round 3 1dc into each of the next 2 sts 1fpdc around the fpdc you just skipped 1dc in the last st 2dc ch2 2dc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2dc ch2 2dc 2dc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch3 to complete the last corner per side 2fpdc 9dc per corner 2dc ch2 2dc round 5 ch3 this counts as your 1st double_crochet 1dc in the space created by the half_double_crochet join *1bpdc around each of the next 3 sts skip the next st this is the fpdc from round 4 1dc into each of the next 2 sts skip st 1 v st into the next st skip st 1dc into each of the next 2 sts skip st this is the fpdc from round 4 1bpdc around each of the next 3 sts 2dc ch2 2dc in the chain-2 corner space* repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting last 2dc ch2 2dc 2dc into the space created by the half_double_crochet join and 1hdc into the top of the beg ch3 to complete the last corner at this point your square will start to become a not so perfect square it is intentional and part of the design so don t panic let the star come through per side 6bpdc 4dc 1 v st per corner 2dc ch2 2dc round 6 ch2 this counts as your 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc in
